scripts.pack:
cd compat-lib &&\
npm pack thin-hook@0.4.0-alpha.62 &&\
npm pack reportage@0.0.11 &&\
npm pack scenarist@1.1.10 &&\
npm pack target-configurator@0.1.11 &&\
npm pack target-injector@0.1.1
scripts.start: gulp https # npm run build must have been done
scripts.start:monitor: gulp monitor # npm run build:monitor must have been done
scripts.test: gulp reportage-run # npm run build:monitor must have been done and npm run start:monitor must be running in another terminal
scripts.test:browser: gulp reportage-browser # npm run build:monitor must have been done and npm run start:monitor must be running in another terminal
